publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-807 Mr Andy Kerr: Budget (Scotland) Bill-That the Parliament agrees to the general principles of the Budget (Scotland) Bill. Supported by: Mr Jack McConnell*, Patricia Ferguson*, Tavish Scott*
S2M-807 Mr Andy Kerr: Budget (Scotland) Bill-That the Parliament agrees to the general principles of the Budget (Scotland) Bill. Supported by: Mr Jack McConnell, Patricia Ferguson, Tavish Scott
